name: Classic Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onions, pickles, and house sauce.

name: Cheese Burger
description: Beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese and classic toppings.

name: Double Beef Burger
description: Two seasoned beef patties stacked with cheese and fresh veggies.

name: Bacon Burger
description: Crispy bacon strips layered over a juicy beef patty with smoky sauce.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: Sautéed mushrooms and Swiss cheese on a perfectly grilled patty.

name: BBQ Burger
description: Beef patty glazed with BBQ sauce, crispy onions, and cheddar cheese.

name: Spicy Jalapeño Burger
description: Hot jalapeños, pepper jack cheese, and a zesty spicy mayo.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Plant-based patty with lettuce, tomato, onions, and herb mayo.

name: Chicken Crispy Burger
description: Crispy fried chicken breast with mayo, lettuce, and pickles.

name: Grilled Chicken Burger
description: Tender grilled chicken fillet with fresh veggies and aioli.
